header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or seek access to the European Union’s internal market under the European Economic Area Agreement”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or seek a special bilateral agreement with the European Union such as that negotiated between the European Union and Switzerland”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or seek a special bilateral agreement with the European Union such as that negotiated between the European Union and Norway”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or seek an enhanced free trade area with Commonwealth countries”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or seek an enhanced free trade area with those countries signed up to the North American Free Trade Agreement”

000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or make separate trading arrangements with other countries on the basis of guidance issued by the Secretary of State to both Houses of Parliament within six months of this referendum”
000: Clause 1, page 1, line 9, at end insert “or become a member of the European Free Trade Association”
